channel.title: Devconf.cz on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Devconf.cz on purpleidea.com

item.title: Ten minute hacks: Process pause & resume
item.description: I’m old school and still rocking an old X220 laptop because I didn’t like the new ones. My battery life isn’t as great as I’d like it to be, but it gets worse when some “webapp” (which I’d much rather have as a native GTK+ app) causes Firefox to rev my CPU with their websocket (hi gmail!) poller. This seems to happen most often on planes or when I’m disconnected from the internet.

item.title: Upcoming speaking
item.description: I’ve got a few upcoming speaking engagements. If you’ll be attending one of these events, come see me or any of the other excellent speakers! Please remember to check the official schedules in case there are any changes! I’ll be speaking at the Brussels CentOS Dojo: Automated Infrastructure Testing with Oh-My-Vagrant ...and the CentOS CI Time/date unconfirmed: I'll be showing some CI tricks, and showing you how the CentOS CI is the perfect CI for multi-machine test environments.
